website_summaries.verdict: A leader when it comes to both price and reliability. Made by a brand that's been a top-seller in batteries for generations.
pros: Batteries hold a charge for a decent period of time and work well for toys and devices that tend to drain batteries fairly quickly
cons: Some users gripe that the batteries are slightly larger than their standard counterparts

customer_reviews.title: Best batteries ever
customer_reviews.text: I've always had amazing luck with these. Sad stores around me don't sell them because they know it takes away constant business. These replace a set I've had for years...
customer_reviews.author: M. James

customer_reviews.title: You could probably find them cheaper...
customer_reviews.text: Right after I bought these the price went up and I wouldn’t paid what they were asking for them now I actually went and bought another brand bc they were cheaper. They work but are kinda pricey for just a two pack.
customer_reviews.author: kbonomo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE ON A GREAT BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: THESE BATTERIES ARE RECHARGABLE AND HOLD THEIR ENERGY VERY WELL. THIS IS A REALLY QUALITY PRODUCT AT A VERY CHEAP PRICE FOR RECHARGABLE BATTERIES. SURE BEATS SENDING YOUR BATTERIES TO A LANDFILL WHERE ALL OF THE BATTERIES THAT ARE NON RECHARGABLE END UP. I WAS TOLD BY A COUPLE RETAILERS THAT THEY SIMPLY THROW THESE AWAY AND ACCEPT RECHARGABLE BATTERIES ONLY AT THEIR STORE. TRUE STORY !
customer_reviews.author: JOE DOE

customer_reviews.title: OK for low drain products.
customer_reviews.text: OK for C batteries, but the Tenergy variety are way better. I know low discharge batteries have gotten better with time, but 3000mAh is too low for today's needs. Spend a little more, and you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: SonnyK

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: I have begun using rechargeables because I like the new battery powered candles, but don't want to be buying and discarding regular batteries as often as is necessary for the candles. The rechargeable are great. I keep extras on hand so when the discharged batteries are being charged, I have another set to keep the candles burning.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Houghton

customer_reviews.title: Good batteries
customer_reviews.text: These actually last well in my kids emergency vehicle toys despite constant use. They charge quickly and seem to do just as well the next time.
customer_reviews.author: El Presidente

customer_reviews.title: The name Rayovac speaks for itself. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Holds charges a long time. I use the BC1HU charger I got here on Amazon that hold all size batteries. I use these in my smoke detectors and I've got 15ft ceilings. Don't want to be changing out batteries all the time.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeHoundTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of juice.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these in my Streamlight spotlight for over a year, and they still hold a charge for hours. It seems like I rarely ever have to recharge them. I ended up buying other sizes and have had the same results. They're great for kids' toys.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosier in TX

customer_reviews.title: I am currently researching whether more expensive rechargeable batteries will do better.
customer_reviews.text: Did not meet my expectations; charge lasted a little over half the life of a same-company disposable battery. I am currently researching whether more expensive rechargeable batteries will do better.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley L. Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Saves us tons of money
customer_reviews.text: We were going through batteries galore when I decided to get this for my son's crib soother. Have to replace every two weeks with the other set we have on charge but never run out of batteries again!
customer_reviews.author: pesavento

customer_reviews.title: Rayovac Platinum Low Self Discharge NiMH C Size Batteries, 2 Pack
customer_reviews.text: These work but have relatively low maH so will need frequent recharging in high drain devices. Will have to see if they last any longer than other Nimh batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver B. Cannady

customer_reviews.title: My 1st set of C size NiMH batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I bought four batteries to replace the nicads in my Fluke 97 Scope meter. Only time will tell if these batteries are any good or not. I just couldn't see paying an extra $15 for a piece of heat shrink tubing and a short wire for essentially the same thing as a NiMH replacement battery pack. So far they seem to charge and work just like they should. They were almost fully charged when I got them. Maybe I'll update my review in 6mo when I've got more use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: batteries hold charge for good length of time. Charge quickly.
customer_reviews.author: bennielou

customer_reviews.title: Great work
customer_reviews.text: I use the Rayovac platium in my wireless speakers and it does the job great. Last longer that the energizer, in use and in rest, charge great with my energizer family charger also.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality battery that has lasted for a few weeks in a baby swing and a vibrating bouncy seat. Heavier than the rechargable Energizer D batteries I bought at the same time. I'll be switching my Energizers out for Rayovac.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed in these batteries
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed in these batteries! Bought them for my cat's toy-The Cat Meow-only worked for a short time and when recharged lasted for even a shorter time. Cat disappointed too!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T,

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable batteries are great
customer_reviews.text: It seems expensive at first to buy rechargeable batteries. They do charge quickly and last a long time, less expensive over time
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Rayovac platinum C size batteries
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase it arrived on time and it works fine so far, I'm very pleased with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: P. Miceli

customer_reviews.title: then the batteries are performing expectedly and aren't a disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because a third-party review ranked these on top. Based on another purchaser's Amazon review, I decided to make sure the batteries were charged. They needed an hour or so on the charger to top off the juice. I going to use them in a gate opener keypad, so we'll see about the other claims with respect to longevity. If you don't hear back from me, then the batteries are performing expectedly and aren't a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: ninjaneer

customer_reviews.title: Very short charge
customer_reviews.text: These are really disappointing. They have a short charge and need very frequent re-charging after little use. I won't be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Monestere

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: great for kids toys!!!! I am so glad I don't have to keep buying pack after pack after pack of batteries for my kids toys. They charge easy. Just put them in every once in a while at night and then pop them back in the toys in the morning and no more melt downs!
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Met all my expectations. They charge quickly and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Simpson

customer_reviews.title: good batteries
customer_reviews.text: Charged them up once and haven't had to charge them since. I put them in my aircraft marshalling wands which are LED so they don't use much juice, and they are still bright as the first time I tried them almost a month later
customer_reviews.author: JDogBlingBling

customer_reviews.title: Best Batteries
customer_reviews.text: I live in S Florida where batteries easily corrode due to moisture. I have learned over the years that the RAYOVAC rechargeable batteries do not corrode as easily as regular batteries or other brands of rechargeable batteries. So now, I don't even consider buying any other batteries except the Rayovac rechargeable ones. IMPORTANT: This product was formerly named "Hybrid" and thus, I recommend getting the Platinum because it is a newer battery.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tischa Weathers

customer_reviews.title: Amazon always has a good price on batteries
customer_reviews.text: These batteries work well and hold a charge. There's not a lot to say about batteries--except if they don't work. Would buy them again. Good price. A great item to add to meet the free shipping criteria.
customer_reviews.author: maxandsam

customer_reviews.title: Rechargeable Bs
customer_reviews.text: Saved a ton of money and since most electronics require batteries now this is the cheapest way out and never have to worry about needing batter5ies.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These re-chargable batteries were the best price I could find, and did the job. Arrived on time and have been working fine since.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but needed rayovac for my game camera, we will see how long they hold a charge
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Less lossage when stored after charging.
customer_reviews.text: They do seem to hold a charge (during inactivity) longer than most other recharageables I've used, and not noticeable defects.
customer_reviews.author: jonl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it all the time. Prompt shipping. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.text: Never had any trouble with these. Even though C type batteries are not that common nowadays, they do come in handy from time to time, Would recomend to anybody who wants a good lasting battery for unusual occasions. And it holds its charge very well when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Aimar

customer_reviews.title: Great batteries
customer_reviews.text: These are great batteries at a great price, we've been using them for a few weeks now and are yet to charge them.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Rayovac self-charge
customer_reviews.text: Charges faster and batteries last longer. Good product. We use these for our outside lights. They do a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Judi L. Bowland

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. no complaints
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. no complaints. I'm using them with a boombox and they work just fine. I have two sets that I alternate between while one set is being recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Ostrich

product_meta.title: Rayovac Rechargeable C Batteries, High Capacity Rechargeable Plus C Battery (2 Count)
product_meta.description:
Less waste, and even more power. RAYOVAC Rechargeable Plus Batteries last up to four times as long as alkaline batteries, and twice as long as standard RAYOVAC rechargeable batteries. Use these powerful batteries time and time again to keep disposable batteries out of landfills and more money in your pocket. Recommended for high drain devices. RAYOVAC Recharge Plus batteries come pre-charged and ready to use. Lasts longer on one charge than RAYOVAC Recharge Batteries.

AMAZON.COM







Rayovac Platinum nickel metal hydride (NiMH) rechargeable batteries are the most economical battery solution for high-drain devices like digital cameras, portable video games, kids toys and wireless gaming accessories.

THE LATEST RECHARGEABLE TECHNOLOGY


View larger.

Low Self Discharge: These NiMH batteries have improved charge retention. With Low Self Discharge, the batteries are able to retain 70% to 80% of their full charge at 6 months and 50% to 60% at 12 months. Low Self Discharge batteries are ready when you are! If you have fully charged the batteries but left them in a device, such as a digital camera, or are storing them in a drawer, they will still have 70% to 80% of their full charge after 6 months! Non Low Self Discharge batteries, also called "Standard" NiMH batteries, can only hold 20% of their full charge capacity after 12 months.

Pre-Charged: Rayovac Platinum Rechargeable batteries come pre-charged and ready to use right out of the package. No need to charge them first!

Cycle Life: Rayovac Platinum Rechargeable batteries can be re-charged and re-used over 300 times. This helps both your pocket book and the environment, saving you $100's vs. disposable alkaline or lithium batteries while reducing waste!

High Performance: Rayovac Platinum Rechargeable Batteries give you superior performance in high-drain devices with high mAh capacity ratings and impressive results in digital cameras:

No "Memory Effect": Unlike Nickel Cadmium (NiCad) rechargeable batteries, Rayovac Platinum NiMH rechargeable batteries do not gradually lose their maximum energy capacity if they are repeatedly recharged after being only partially discharged. Rayovac Platinum NiMH rechargeable batteries can be recharged at any state of discharge without harming the performance of the battery.





RAYOVAC NIMH RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES MAKE AN ENVIRONMENTALLY SMART CHOICE.
REDUCE WASTE
They can be charged and reused up to 500 times, producing far less waste than disposable alkaline or lithium.

NO TOXIC CHEMICALS
They do not contain the toxic chemicals that are found in older Nickel Cadmium (NiCd) Rechargeables.

RECYCLABLE
Rayovac has partnered with Call2Recycle, giving consumers the ability to recycle NiMH batteries for FREE. There are 30,000 drop-off sites available at municipalities and retailers. Drop-off site locations can be found by calling 1-800-8-BATTERY or visiting http://www.call2recycle.org.





Rayovac Platinum NiMH Rechargeable Batteries are available in AA, AAA, C, D and 9V sizes.

Two chargers are also available, a 5 hour charger for AA and AAA and an overnight charger for AA,AAA, C, D and 9V battery sizes.

 PACKAGING
Rayovac Platinum offers a 100% paper package (made with 80% recycled content) on its rechargeable batteries.
feature_bullets: Lasts up to 4x Longer than Alkaline Batteries - Keep your devices powered up to 4 times longer vs RAYOVAC High Energy Batteries
Batteries Come Charged & Ready To Use – RAYOVAC Rechargeable Batteries are ready to use right out of the pack. For optimal performance, RAYOVAC recommends charging batteries prior to using
5 Year Power Warranty – Covers batteries for 5 Years while in storage

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
